players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead during the night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
You: "Strange indeed, Diana. It's tough to know who to trust, but we need to work together to figure this out. Charlie, do you have any thoughts?"
Charlie: "Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the mafioso. It's important that we work together to ensure their actions are limited and ultimately stop them from causing any more harm."
You: "Charlie, your accusation is quite bold. We have no concrete evidence, and it seems like you're trying to divert attention. Diana, do you really trust Charlie's claim without any proof?"

Diana: "I believe we should focus on finding concrete evidence to support our suspicions instead of making accusations without proof. It's important that we work together and trust each other to uncover the truth."
